tool_description: API to scrape and parse search engine results. Including Google, Bing, Yahoo! and more.
title: SerpApi

api_list.name: Search API
api_list.description: Scrape and parse search engine results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serpapi.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serpapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
